tumblr.api_key: [ENTER TUMBLR API KEY HERE, SEE TUMBLR SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]

twitter.consumer_key: [ENTER TWITTER CONSUMER KEY HERE, SEE TWITTER SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]
twitter.consumer_secret: [ENTER TWITTER CONSUMER SECRET HERE, SEE TWITTER SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]
twitter.user_key: [ENTER TWITTER USER KEY HERE, SEE TWITTER SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]
twitter.user_secret: [ENTER TWITTER USER SECRET HERE, SEE TWITTER SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]

github.access_token: [ENTER GITHUB ACCESS TOKEN HERE, SEE GITHUB SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]
github.client_secret: [ENTER GITHUB CLIENT SECRET HERE, SEE GITHUB SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]

instagram.access_token: [ENTER INSTAGRAM ACCESS TOKEN HERE, SEE INSTAGRAM SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]
instagram.user_id: [ENTER INSTAGRAM USER_ID HERE, SEE INSTAGRAM SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]
instagram.client_id: [ENTER INSTAGRAM CLIENT_ID HERE, SEE INSTAGRAM SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]
instagram.client_secret: [ENTER INSTAGRAM CLIENT_SECRET HERE, SEE INSTAGRAM SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]

foursquare.access_token: [ENTER FOURSQUARE ACCESS TOKEN HERE, SEE FOURSQUARE SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]
foursquare.client_id: [ENTER FOURSQUARE CLIENT_ID HERE, SEE FOURSQUARE SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]
foursquare.oauth_client_secret: [ENTER FOURSQUARE CLIENT_SECRET HERE, SEE FOURSQUARE SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]

lastfm.api_key: [ENTER LASTFM API_KEY HERE, SEE LASTFM SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]

steam.api_key: [ENTER YOUR STEAM API KEY HERE, SEE STEAM SETUP INSTRUCTIONS]

tent.entity_uri: [ENTER YOUR ENTITY URI HERE] ex. https://yourname.tent.is
tent.feed_url: [ENTER A URL TO YOUR FEED] ex. https://yourname.tent.is

flickr.flickr_id: [ENTER YOUR FLICKR ID (NOT USERNAME) HERE] //You do your username->ID lookup here: http://idgettr.com/

linkedin.api_secret: [ENTER YOUR LINKEDIN CONSUMER SECRET KEY HERE]
linkedin.token: [ENTER YOUR LINKED IN USER TOKEN HERE]
